text: Ðis synd þa landgemære æt reodemære leage.
Of sealter forda ondlong glences<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð þær riþig mæres broc sceot of glencing.
Þonan riht to ceolan heafdan, of ceolon heafdon to longan læge.
Of longan læge to bruttan geate, of bruttan geate to wærlafes dune.
Suþeweardre of wærlafes dune on miclan feld, of miclan feldan on wen broc.
Ondlong wen broces þæt hit cymð to þan mære, on efen cronmere þonon ondlong þæs ealdan gemæres,<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð þær afoc broc sceot on glencing.
Þonne ondlong glencing eft on salter forda.
